entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening and ending overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the evening and ending before morning. Snow or ice pellets in the evening and after midnight. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
